## Vote.balance() method

Check the balance of the project wallet in the native token of the chain

**Signature:**

```typescript
balance(): Promise<CurrencyValue>;
```

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;CurrencyValue&gt;

- The balance of the project in the native token of the chain
